artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Jan Prints; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Double weave silk cloth with different warp and weft density in ivory with very faded vertical bands of pastel blue. Pocketed areas form regular pattern of sixpointed stars and diamond shapes. Double weave silk cloth with different warp and weft density in ivory with very faded vertical bands of pastel blue. Pocketed areas form regular pattern of sixpointed stars and diamond shapes. smoked pearl
